description: A jnxFruInsertion trap signifies that the SNMP
entity, acting in an agent role, has detected that
the specified FRU (Field Replaceable Unit)
inserted into the chassis does not match what was
configured.

event.Summary: FRU inserted into the chassis does not match with the configuration

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruNotifMismatch JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgContentsIndex i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL1Index i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL2Index i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL3Index i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgType o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1

description: The associated jnxContentsContainerIndex in the
jnxContentsTable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgContentsIndex

description: The level one index associated with this
subject. Zero if unavailable or inapplicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL1Index

description: The level two index associated with this
subject. Zero if unavailable or inapplicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL2Index

description: The level three index associated with this
subject. Zero if unavailable or inapplicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL3Index

description: The object ID for this FRU
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgType

description: Notification of the Administrative state of the otn interface
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruNotifAdminStatus JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgContentsIndex i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL1Index i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL2Index i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL3Index i 9999 JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgAdminState i 1

description: The associated jnxContentsContainerIndex in the
jnxContentsTable.

description: The level one index associated with this
subject. Zero if unavailable or inapplicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL1Index

description: The level two index associated with this
subject. Zero if unavailable or inapplicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL2Index

description: The level three index associated with this
subject. Zero if unavailable or inapplicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgL3Index

description: The Administrative state of this FRU
variables.name: JUNIPER-FRU-MIB::jnxFruCfgAdminState

description: Notification of Operational state of the otn interface

description: The associated jnxContentsContainerIndex in the
jnxContentsTable.

description: The level one index associated with this
subject. Zero if unavailable or inapplicable.

description: The level two index associated with this
